attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD ITS A FAKE APP
attributes.review: Do not download this app. If you want your private information in the hands of the Chinese government do not down load this app. This was created by the Chinese government to spy on American citizens. The trump administration as already said and this is not an official app for the 2020 race. Do not download this. It’s will mess up your phone and everything will be tracked by the Chinese government.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: If I could give this one start I would. This app completely messed up my phone as soon as I downloaded it the battery drained and I started getting weird messages. My dog even got sick after the app was downloaded. The drs had no idea why my dog was sick to I eventually just deleted the app and finally my phone and my dog returned to normal. BE WARE DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

attributes.title: wasn’t it 🧚🏼‍♀️💖✨
attributes.review:
Dear Mr. Trump,

I had HIGH expectations from you sir ✨. You’re a rich man 🥴 but this app isn’t it. The glitches are like the lags on Minecraft when I’m shoveling the dirt 😟😣. Trump, you are a BILLIONAIRE💸💰💰💸!! WE NEED BILLIONAIRE APPLICATIONS.💖✨🧚🏼‍♀️ Gurl this just wasn’t it💖🧚🏼‍♀️✨. I don’t like the fonts either🤢. Nope, don’t recommend. If I had the chance it’d be 0/5, you lucky you got ONE ⭐️. Are you lost baby boy #allappsmatterbabyboy ♡

attributes.title: HORRIBLE 😌
attributes.review: I decided to download this app as everyone was RAVING about it, and I like to get information on the downfall of my country so I just had to get it. I was surprised by all the glitches and problems with this app. I would not recommend downloading it because in my opinion it tried to steal all of my information and sell it to China. 🤪😖✌️

attributes.title: Horrible I almost died
attributes.review: I was on my way to my house THAT IVE BEEN LIVING IN FOR MY WHOLE LIFE IM 60 🤡 and I support trump🤡by the way 🤡and I need a gps to get there but out of nowhere this app opened up and took Over my steering wheel and it DROVE ME INTO A CLIFF LIKE YO TAKE THIS APP OF THE APP STORE ITS TERRIBLE IT GIVES TERRIBLE FOOD IT DOESNT EVEN HELP IN ANYWAYS IT JUST TRYS TO KILL ME AND I DIDNT HELP ME FIND THE ADULT DIAPERS I NEED HORRIBLE DISAPPOINTED 😔🤡😂😭😼 IT ALSO GAVE  ME CLOWN EMOJIS BECAUSE I SUPPORT TRUMP  AND BECAUSE IN ARGUMENT ALL I SAY IS 🤡TRUMP 2020🤡 AND I TRY TO FIND REASONABLE WAYS TO SUPPORT 🤡TRUMP BUT I NEVER CAN🤡

attributes.title: Trump 2020 🧚🏻‍♀️❣️ but on a gravestone
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to keep up with the Cheeto baby man. All was well until the next day when my dogs started speaking in Russian 🇦🇴 and walking on their 2 legs like a human!! 😨 they also started bullying my little sister 🥺. Not to mention my brother started eating 3 jars of pickles everyday 🤮. HE HATES PICKLES. This app has ruined my life 😥! Screw you cheeto man baby 👶🍊#settleforbiden ❗️❗️‼️

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app is very bad when I opened it I was scared almost to death I seen this orange looking thing on there yeah it’s a no I had to leave the app mediately because I thought something was wrong with my phone . It also has glitches like saying “trump 2020” just ewww no it’s a bad app it doesn’t work if I could give it 0 stars I would

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!!!!!!
attributes.review: The worst app ever! After I turned off the app notifications Trump literally came to my house and killed my family and stole my dog. I think that I made him mad by not going to his Tulsa rally, like it’s not my vault my hamster had a therapy appointment. Anyway, now I have to pay for therapy for me AND my hamster since we are both traumatized my the triple homicide last night.😿 R.I.P Oreo, mom, and dad.

attributes.title: Unacceptable
attributes.review: This app is filled with false information and not showing the real world! Trump is trying to  make this “great” country but in reality he is spreading hate and false information all around the world. This app shows how trump doesn’t care for us and only wants fame & glory 🤬 I had a horrible experience on this wannabe app! Trump 2020✨💖🧚on a gravestone🔪 horrible app. Never use it

attributes.title: giving me very ✨𝓭𝓲𝓼𝓽𝓪𝓼𝓽𝓮𝓯𝓾𝓵✨
attributes.review:
i just wanted to support the big orange tan man and download the app when all of a sudden my microwave started playing 
🎶 sHaWtY’s LiKe A mElOdY iN mY hEad🎶 and my pet fish Jose Taco Enchilada Quesadilla had a seizure just milliseconds after cursing me out in arabic. now ik it’s 2020 and you can’t limit what’s to play out but this app is just TEW MUCH and i can’t take it. i will be deleting IMMEDIATELY🥰🥰
